problem.problem_statement: How can we make sure that trees and plants we move to new places survive better?
problem.goalTitle: Protect, restore and promote sustainable use of terrestrial ecosystems, sustainably manage forests, combat desertification, and halt and reverse land degradation and halt biodiversity loss

problem.problem_statement: How can we make getting clean water from the sea more efficient?
problem.goalTitle: Ensure access to affordable, reliable, sustainable and modern energy for all

problem.problem_statement: How can planting more trees help reduce wildfire risks?
problem.goalTitle: Protect, restore and promote sustainable use of terrestrial ecosystems, sustainably manage forests, combat desertification, and halt and reverse land degradation and halt biodiversity loss

problem.problem_statement: How can we use the knowledge of indigenous people to help save forests?
problem.goalTitle: Strengthen the means of implementation and revitalize the Global Partnership for Sustainable Development

problem.problem_statement: How can we make cities friendlier for bees to help grow more food?
problem.goalTitle: End hunger, achieve food security and improved nutrition and promote sustainable agriculture
